title: What is the current view of vaccination among chiropractors?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Chiropractic colleges teach the current vaccination schedules. However, generally being outside-the-box thinkers, and inclined to natural health and healing, chiropractors being the largest branch of Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) have historically had the focus on ...
